entries.hoth_quote_01: FFFFFFHan Solo: "There isn't enough life on this ice cube to fill a space cruiser."
entries.hoth_quote_02: FFFFFFC-3PO: "Artoo says the chances of survival are seven hundred twenty-five...to one."
entries.hoth_quote_03: FFFFFFC-3PO: "You must come along now R2. There's really nothing more we can do. And my joints are freezing up."
entries.hoth_quote_04: FFFFFFPrincess Leia: "An Imperial probe droid."  Han Solo: "It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here."  General Rieekan: "We'd better start the evacuation."
entries.hoth_quote_05: FFFFFFDarth Vader: "That is the system. And I'm sure Skywalker is with them. Set your course for the Hoth system. General Veers, prepare your men."
entries.hoth_quote_06: FFFFFFGeneral Veers: "My lord, the fleet has moved out of light-speed. Com-Scan has detected an energy field protecting an area around the sixth planet of the Hoth system. The field is strong enough to deflect any bombardment."
entries.hoth_planet_d: FFFFFFThe icy planet of Hoth is unpopulated and uninhabitable except for a small area around its equator. Native life-forms include the tauntaun, which survives on lichen and ice worms, and the wampa, a carnivorous predator.   The isolated planet is an ideal location for the hidden Rebel base, far away from the eyes of the Galactic Empire.
entries.hoth_quote_07: FFFFFFGeneral Rieekan: "I don't think we can protect two transports at a time."  Princess Leia: "It's risky but we can't hold out much longer. We have no choice."
